meaningMnemonic: If you <radical>loiter</radical> around a <radical>surplus</radical> of anything, you need to be <kanji>gentle</kanji> and touch everything <kanji>gently</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You have to be <kanji>gentle</kanji> and handle these things <kanji>gently</kanji> because they belong to <reading>Jo</reading>-Anne (じょ). You're loitering around her surplus of (whatever you decided to imagine).
